name: Cubethon
description: This is a puzzle game that tests players' eye and hand coordination abilities, providing them with a speed and passionate experience. The game is set against a black hole, dark and mysterious. The red block moves forward bravely on the white block, and players use the A and D keys to control the left and right movement of the red block. Along the way, obstacles keep falling on the track. Players need to adjust the position of the red blocks appropriately to ensure that they are unobstructed along the way. Accompanied by passionate and melodious music, players can enjoy a thrilling gaming experience. Come and give it a try!
